column3: Currently the `ping` column is largest, But I think `User Agent` might be a the best choice. Anecdotally, it also has the longest, with the most interesting information on its right hand side (where it would be hidden if the column was too small). Also some nodes like to put messages/easter eggs in their user agent, so if we made it the bigger-by-default column they'd be easier to discover.\n\nE
